source_sentence: 佛說十地經卷第一
translation: Foshuo shidi jing, vol. 1

source_sentence: 大唐國僧法界從中印度持此
translation: The Great Tang National Monk Hōkai from Central India holds this

source_sentence: 梵本請于闐三藏沙門尸羅達
translation: Sanskrit text requested from the Tripiṭaka monk Śīladhara

source_sentence: 摩於北庭龍興寺譯
translation: Translated at Lungxingsi, Beityeong

source_sentence: 菩薩極喜地第一之一
translation: one of the first bodhisattva stages of ultimate bliss

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，薄伽梵成道未久，第二七日，住於他化自在天中，自在天王宮摩尼寶藏殿，與大菩薩無量眾俱。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, not long after he attained enlightenment, the Bhagavān spent the second seven days of his life abiding in the palace of the self-arisen god Mahānīprabhāsa, accompanied by an incalculable number of great bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 其諸菩薩悉從異佛剎來集，皆於無上正等菩提，得不退轉，一生所繫，當證正覺。
translation: All of those bodhisattvas had gathered from different buddha bases, had attained unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, had never turned back, and had been bound to one life, and would realize correct awakening.

source_sentence: 所謂：已得安住一切菩薩智所行境，皆能趣入一切如來智所行處，無有休息；善能示現，種種神通諸所作事，應時無滯，成熟調伏一切有情；利樂他事皆不虛棄，引發一切菩薩願，劫世剎土量等修行，暫無休息；一切菩薩，福智資糧，善備無盡，令諸世間，共所受用；已到一切菩薩智慧方便彼岸，示入生死及涅槃門，而不廢捨修菩薩行；善能遊戲解了，趣入一切菩薩靜慮、解脫、等持、等至、神通、明智，於是一切諸所作事，皆得善巧；由獲一切菩薩神通威力自在，以無功用隨心剎那，悉能往詣一切如來道場眾會，而為上首請佛說法；受持一切如來法輪，廣能供養、承事諸佛；常勤修習，一切菩薩所行事業；其身普現一切世間，言音無礙，清徹法界心智無滯，普見三世一切境界。
translation: 所謂：已得安住一切菩薩智所行境，皆能趣入一切如來智所行處，無有休息；善能示現，種種神通諸所作事，應時無滯，成熟調伏一切有情；利樂他事皆不虛棄，引發一切菩薩願，劫世剎土量等修行，暫無休息；一切菩薩，福智資糧，善備無盡，令諸世間，共所受用；已到一切菩薩智慧方便彼岸，示入生死及涅槃門，而不廢捨修菩薩行；善能遊戲解了，趣入一切菩薩靜慮、解脫、等持、等至、神通、明智，於是一切諸所作事，皆得善巧；由獲一切菩薩神通威力自在，以無功用隨心剎那，悉能往詣一切如來道場眾會，而為上首請佛說法；受持一切如來法輪，廣能供養、承事諸佛；常勤修習，一切菩薩所行事業；其身普現一切世間，言音無礙，清徹法界心智無滯，普見三世一切境界。

source_sentence: 一切菩薩所有祕藏功德正行悉已圓滿，設加無量不可說劫讚其功德亦不能盡。
translation: All the bodhisattvas' secret store of merits and correct practices have been fully completed, and their virtues couldn't be exhausted even if they were praised over measureless, ineffable eons.

source_sentence: 其名曰：金剛藏菩薩、寶藏菩薩、蓮華藏菩薩、德藏菩薩、蓮花德藏菩薩、日藏菩薩、曜藏菩薩、地藏菩薩、無垢月藏菩薩、示一切莊嚴光明藏菩薩、智慧普照明藏菩薩、旃檀德藏菩薩、妙吉祥藏菩薩、花德藏菩薩、拘蘇摩德藏菩薩、優鉢羅德藏菩薩、天德藏菩薩、福德藏菩薩、無礙淨智藏菩薩、功德勝藏菩薩、那羅延德藏菩薩、無垢藏菩薩、離垢藏菩薩、種種辯才莊嚴藏菩薩、大光明網照藏菩薩、離垢威德光明王藏菩薩、無礙妙音美響藏菩薩、總持功德能度一切有情願藏菩薩、大海莊嚴藏菩薩、蘇迷盧德藏菩薩、示現一切功德清淨藏菩薩、如來德藏菩薩、佛德藏菩薩、淳金微妙大威德王光明藏菩薩、一切相莊嚴淨藏菩薩、金剛焰胸萬字相莊嚴菩薩、星宿王光照藏菩薩、虛空庫無礙智藏菩薩、解脫月菩薩，如是等菩薩摩訶薩無量無數，不可思議、不可量、不可稱、無邊無際、無有分齊、不可說不可說，皆從異異佛剎來集，金剛藏菩薩而為上首。
translation: 其名曰：金剛藏菩薩、寶藏菩薩、蓮華藏菩薩、德藏菩薩、蓮花德藏菩薩、日藏菩薩、曜藏菩薩、地藏菩薩、無垢月藏菩薩、示一切莊嚴光明藏菩薩、智慧普照明藏菩薩、旃檀德藏菩薩、妙吉祥藏菩薩、花德藏菩薩、拘蘇摩德藏菩薩、優鉢羅德藏菩薩、天德藏菩薩、福德藏菩薩、無礙淨智藏菩薩、功德勝藏菩薩、那羅延德藏菩薩、無垢藏菩薩、離垢藏菩薩、種種辯才莊嚴藏菩薩、大光明網照藏菩薩、離垢威德光明王藏菩薩、無礙妙音美響藏菩薩、總持功德能度一切有情願藏菩薩、大海莊嚴藏菩薩、蘇迷盧德藏菩薩、示現一切功德清淨藏菩薩、如來德藏菩薩、佛德藏菩薩、淳金微妙大威德王光明藏菩薩、一切相莊嚴淨藏菩薩、金剛焰胸萬字相莊嚴菩薩、星宿王光照藏菩薩、虛空庫無礙智藏菩薩、解脫月菩薩，如是等菩薩摩訶薩無量無數，不可思議、不可量、不可稱、無邊無際、無有分齊、不可說不可說，皆從異異佛剎來集，金剛藏菩薩而為上首。

source_sentence: 爾時，金剛藏菩薩，承佛神力，入於菩薩妙三摩地，名大乘光明。
translation: At the time, the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva, thanks to the Buddha's spiritual power, entered the bodhisattva's marvelous absorption, which is called great vehicle radiance.

source_sentence: 入此定已，即時十方各過十俱胝佛剎微塵數世界之外，各有十俱胝佛剎微塵數諸佛如來，同名金剛藏；皆現其面，俱作是言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: After he had entered this concentration, immediately, beyond the number of dust motes in each of the ten directions, there were ten dust motes of buddha-tathāgatas with the same name, Vajragarbha, who all appeared before him and said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 佛子！
translation: Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 汝今乃能入是大乘光明菩薩等持。
translation: Now, you've been able to enter this equipoise of the great vehicle's luminous bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 然善男子！
translation: Still, good sons!

source_sentence: 今彼十方各十俱胝佛剎微塵數諸佛如來共加持汝，以此世尊毘盧遮那本願威神力所持故，為一切菩薩趣入，能顯不可思議佛法光明。
translation: Tathāgatas of the ten corpuscular buddha-temples in each of the ten directions are united in their support of you, because of the power of the Bhagavān Vairocana's former vows, they are the entry point for all bodhisattvas and can reveal the unfathomable radiance of the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 諸智地中為令攝受一切善根，為擇一切佛法善巧，為廣知法，為正演說善成立法，為無分別智得清淨，為一切魔法不染，為出世法善根得淨，為證不思議智所行境，乃至為證佛智境界；又為一切菩薩十地發趣及得，為如實說諸菩薩地安立善巧，為正緣慮諸佛妙法，為修無漏法之差別，為善選擇決定大慧光明善巧，為趣入於決定智門，為獲顯示如所應處無畏辯說，為證廣大無礙解地，為菩提心念不遺失，為善成熟諸有情界，為一切處通達決定選擇辯才。
translation: 諸智地中為令攝受一切善根，為擇一切佛法善巧，為廣知法，為正演說善成立法，為無分別智得清淨，為一切魔法不染，為出世法善根得淨，為證不思議智所行境，乃至為證佛智境界；又為一切菩薩十地發趣及得，為如實說諸菩薩地安立善巧，為正緣慮諸佛妙法，為修無漏法之差別，為善選擇決定大慧光明善巧，為趣入於決定智門，為獲顯示如所應處無畏辯說，為證廣大無礙解地，為菩提心念不遺失，為善成熟諸有情界，為一切處通達決定選擇辯才。

source_sentence: 然善男子！
translation: Still, good sons!

source_sentence: 汝當辯說此法差別善巧法門。
translation: You should explain this teaching with the skillful way of distinguishing between dharmas.

source_sentence: 所謂：由承諸佛威神力故，已諸如來智慧光明所加持故，已善圓淨自善根故，已善瑩飾真法界故，已普攝益諸有情故，已證法身智所依故，已從諸佛受灌頂故，已現超過一切世間最大身故，已越一切世間趣故，已淨出世正法趣故，已能圓滿一切智智故。」
translation: It means that it's because you have inherited the authoritative power of the buddhas, have been endowed with the brightness of the tathāgatas' wisdom, have skillfully and completely purified your own good roots, have skillfully adorned the true Dharma realm, have universally included sentient beings, have realized the basis of the knowledge of the Dharma body, have received the consecration from the buddhas, have shown the greatest body that transcends all mundane paths, have transcended all mundane paths, have purified the path of the true Dharma that transcends the world, and have been able to complete the knowledge of all things."

source_sentence: 爾時十方彼諸如來，與金剛藏菩提薩埵無映奪身，與無罣礙演說辯才，與入微妙清淨智辯，與無忘失念所加持，與善決定慧之善巧，與不棄捨周遍行智，與正等覺力無有能摧伏，與如來無所畏令無怯弱，與以一切智智所攝大無礙解辯法理趣決定安立，賜與引發一切如來善分別身、語、意莊嚴。
translation: It was then that the tathāgatas in the ten directions gave Vajrasattva Bodhisattva's unreflected body, unimpeded eloquence in exposition, entry into subtle and pure wisdom and eloquence, the upholding of mindfulness without forgetfulness, the skillfulness of well-determined wisdom, the knowledge of the universal practice of not discarding, the power of right ascertainment that's invulnerable, the tathāgatas' fearlessness that makes them not faint, the certainty of the principle of great unhindered understanding and elucidation of the Dharma contained in omniscience, and the bestowal and initiation of all tathāgatas' adornments of body, speech, and mind.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 由此菩薩獲彼大乘光明等持，法爾如故，以本誓願所引發故，善淨增上妙意樂故，已善瑩飾淨智輪故，已善積集諸資糧故，已善鍊治所作事故，以無量念而為器故，明朗勝解得清淨故，善達無雜總持門故，法界智印之所印故。
translation: Thus, the bodhisattva attains the equipoise of that great vehicle's radiance, just as it was in the past, because it was sparked by the vow, because it's well-purified, has increased sublime aspirations, has well-decorated the pure wisdom wheel, has well-collected the necessary accumulations, has well-trained the task that's undertaken, has innumerable mindfulnesses as its container, has attained purity in its clarity and resolve, has well comprehended the unadulterated dhāraṇī, and has been sealed with the seal of the Dharma realm's wisdom.

source_sentence: 爾時，十方彼佛世尊，不起于座，以神通力，各申右手摩金剛藏大菩薩頂。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān addressed the buddhas in the ten directions, got up from his seat, and with his supernormal powers, he rubbed his right hand over the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva's head.

source_sentence: 時金剛藏菩提薩埵，蒙彼十方佛摩頂已，即從定起，普告一切菩薩眾言：「唯諸佛子！
translation: After being rubbed on the head by those buddhas in the ten directions, the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva rose from his meditative state and addressed all the bodhisattvas, saying, "Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 是菩薩願，決定無雜不可照了廣大法界盡虛空性，窮未來際能救一切諸有情類。
translation: It's the bodhisattva's vow to definitely and unadulteratedly comprehend the entire space nature of the vast Dharma realm and to save all sentient beings in the limit of the future.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩安處於此願中，方能入於過去諸佛世尊智地，乃能入於未來諸佛世尊智地，亦能入於現在諸佛世尊智地。
translation: Only when a bodhisattva stands in this vow can he enter the stage of knowledge of the world-honored buddhas of the past, the stage of knowledge of the future buddhas, and the stage of knowledge of the present buddhas.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 一切菩薩有十智地，是以過去、未來、現在諸佛，已說、當說、今說，由此密意我作是言。
translation: "All bodhisattvas have ten stages of wisdom, which is why the buddhas of the past, future, and present have taught, will teach, and will teach in the present, and because of this hidden intention I say this.

source_sentence: 何等為十？
translation: "What are the ten?

source_sentence: 一名極喜地，二名離垢，三名發光，四名焰慧，五名難勝，六名現前，七名遠行，八名不動，九名善慧，十名法雲。
translation: There's one that's the ground of ultimate bliss, two that's free from pollution, three that emits light, four that's burning wisdom, five that's difficult to overcome, six that's present, seven that's far-reaching, eight that's motionless, nine that's good wisdom, and 10 that's a cloud of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 此名一切菩薩十地。
translation: "This is called the ten stages of all bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 是以過去、未來、現在諸佛，已說、當說、今說。
translation: Because of this, the buddhas of the past, future, and present have taught it, will teach it, and will teach it now.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the buddhas!

source_sentence: 我不見有諸佛國界，彼中如來不歎說此菩薩十地者。
translation: I don't see any buddha lands where the Tathāgata doesn't praise this bodhisattva's ten stages.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩增上勝妙，能淨一切諸菩薩道法門光明，謂即十地安立解釋。
translation: "These bodhisattvas are superior and marvelous, and they purify the light of all the bodhisattva path's teachings, which are the explanation of the ten stages of establishment.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 當知此處不可思議，謂於諸地安立法中自所證智。」
translation: You should know that this is inconceivable, which is to say that it's the knowledge that's realized within the stable laws of the stages."

source_sentence: 爾時，金剛藏菩薩，標斯十地名已默然而住，不復分別而解釋之。
translation: At that point, the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva marked the names of the ten stages and waited silently, explaining them without further discernment.

source_sentence: 是時一切諸菩薩眾，聞說菩薩十地名已，不聞解釋，咸生渴仰作如是念：「何因何緣是金剛藏菩提薩埵，唯說菩薩十地名已，默然而住更不解釋？」
translation: All the bodhisattvas who then heard the names of the bodhisattva's ten stages explained and didn't hear them explained all became thirsty and had this thought, "What cause and reason is it that Vajragarbha Bodhisattva simply explained the names of the bodhisattva's ten stages and then remained silent without explaining them?"

source_sentence: 爾時，於此菩薩眾中有一菩薩名解脫月，知諸大眾心之所念，即以頌問金剛藏菩薩曰：「何故正覺者，　　念智功德具；　標諸上妙地，　　自在不解釋？
translation: At the time, there was a bodhisattva named Jietsuki among this assembly of bodhisattvas who, knowing what the minds of the people were thinking, asked the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva with a verse, "Why does the rightly enlightened one possess the merit of mindfulness and knowledge and project all the higher, more sublime stages with unimpededness and noninterpretation?

source_sentence: 一切咸決定，　　菩薩大名稱；　何故說地名，　　而不演其義？
translation: "All are certain, the bodhisattva's great name; why is the earth's name spoken and its meaning not explained?

source_sentence: 一切諸佛子，　　無畏皆樂聞；　願為正分別，　　說諸地義趣。
translation: All the children of the Buddha, fearless and happy to hear, may I correctly discern and explain the stages' meanings and destinies.

source_sentence: 眾會悉清淨，　　離懈怠嚴整，　鮮潔住堅實，　　具足功德智；　相視咸恭敬，　　一切悉專仰；　唯望法甘露，　　如蜂念淨蜜。」
translation: Their assemblies are all pure, freed from laziness and adornment, kept pure and resolute, endowed with the knowledge of virtues, they all look upon each other with respect and devotion, and they only hope for the nectar of the Dharma, like bees mindful of pure honey."

source_sentence: 大智無畏者，　　金剛藏聞是，　欲令大眾悅，　　以頌詶佛子：「雖作最勝甚希有，　　此能顯示菩薩行；　辯地能作最微妙，　　由此佛地有修證。
translation: The great fearless one of wisdom, whom Vajragarbha heard, wanted to please the public, and answered the Buddha's son with a verse, "Although this is the most excellent and rare thing to do, it shows the bodhisattva's practice; it's the most subtle thing to do at the debating stage, and it's cultivated at the buddha stage.

source_sentence: 微細難見離分別，　　遠離心地難證悟；　智者境界純無漏，　　世間聞者悉迷惑。
translation: Subtle and difficult to see, free of discrimination, and difficult to realize far from the mind ground, the realm of the wise is pure and uncontaminated, and those who hear it in the world are deluded.

source_sentence: 安心不動如金剛，　　信解佛智最殊勝；　了知無我唯心地，　　此能聞斯微細智。
translation: Their minds are unmoving like adamant, and their faith and understanding of the Buddha's wisdom is most extraordinary; they understand that selflessness is only the mind ground, and they can hear this subtle wisdom.

source_sentence: 如以眾彩畫虛空，　　如風依於鳥路行；　無漏佛智亦如是，　　雖為分別而難見。
translation: Like painting space with many colors, like the wind traveling on the path of a bird, so is the untainted Buddha's cognition, which is difficult to see despite discrimination.

source_sentence: 故今吾興如是智，　　世間難有知此者；　及能信此最勝法，　　是故不任廣解釋。」
translation: Therefore, I have developed such knowledge, which is difficult for the world to know, and I'm able to believe in this most excellent teaching, so I don't need to explain it in detail."

source_sentence: 爾時，解脫月菩薩聞是語已，白金剛藏菩薩言：「佛子！
translation: After hearing these words, the Candragarbha Bodhisattva replied, "Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 今此眾會皆悉清淨，其諸菩薩善淨意樂、善潔思念、善修諸行，已善承事無量百千俱胝諸佛，善集資糧，成就無量種種功德，永離疑惑無諸垢亹，善住增上意樂勝解，於佛法中不隨他教。
translation: Now, this congregation is completely purified, and its bodhisattvas have good clean intentions, good pure thoughts, and good cultivation of practices, have well-devoted themselves to serving measureless hundreds of thousands of buddhas, have well-collected accumulations, have accomplished measureless kinds of merit, are permanently free of doubt and uncertainty and free of defilement, well-stay with superior intent and resolve, and don't follow other teachings in the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: How excellent!

source_sentence: 佛子演說此義，是諸菩薩於如是處現證而住。」
translation: When the Buddha-son teaches this meaning, these bodhisattvas abide in this place of present realization."

source_sentence: 爾時解脫月菩薩，欲重宣此義而說頌曰：「願說最安隱，　　菩薩無上行；　分別於諸地，　　智淨成正覺。
translation: It was then that the Candragupta Moon bodhisattva wanted to recapitulate this meaning and spoke the verse, "May it be said, 'Most peaceful, the bodhisattva's unsurpassed practice, discriminating among the stages, purifying wisdom and becoming perfectly enlightened.

source_sentence: 此眾無諸亹，　　志解悉明潔；　承事無量佛，　　能知此地義。」
translation: This multitude has no defilements, and their aspirations are all clear and unclouded; they serve measureless buddhas and can know the meaning of this place."

source_sentence: 時金剛藏菩薩言：「佛子！
translation: The Vajragarbha Bodhisattva then said, "Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 雖此眾會皆悉清淨，其諸菩薩善淨意樂、善潔思念、善修諸行，已善能承事無量百千俱胝諸佛，善集資糧，成就無量種種功德，永離疑惑無諸垢釁，善住增上意樂勝解，於佛法中不隨他教。
translation: Although this congregation is perfectly pure, those bodhisattvas' intentions are well-purified, their thoughts are well-purified, and their practices are well-cultivated, and they're well able to serve measureless hundreds of thousands of buddhas, gather accumulation, achieve measureless merits, permanently part with doubt and confusion, have no stains or defilements, and well-stay with superior intent and resolve, so they don't follow other teachings in the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 然有其餘劣解有情，聞此甚深難思議處忽生疑惑，是彼長夜能引無義無利眾苦。
translation: Still, there are other poorly understood sentient beings who hear about this profound and inconceivable place and suddenly become doubtful, which can lead to meaningless and unbeneficial suffering over the long haul.

source_sentence: 我愍此等，故樂默然。」
translation: Because I pity such people, I'm happy to remain silent."

source_sentence: 爾時，金剛藏菩薩，欲重宣此義而說頌曰：「雖此眾淨廣智慧，　　甚深明利能決擇；　其心不動如山王，　　不可傾覆猶大海。
translation: At the time, Vajragarbha Bodhisattva wanted to recapitulate this meaning and spoke a verse, "Although this multitude of pure and vast wisdom is so profound and insightful that it can be discerned, its mind doesn't budge like a mountain king, and it's like an ocean that can't be overturned.

source_sentence: 有行未久解未得，　　隨識而行不隨智；　聞此生疑墮惡道，　　我愍是等故不說。」
translation: There are those whose practice has yet to be understood for a long time, whose practice follows consciousness and doesn't follow wisdom, and whose hearing of this gives rise to doubt that leads to a bad path, so I pity those who don't explain it."

source_sentence: 爾時，解脫月菩薩，復白金剛藏菩薩言：「善哉！
translation: At that point, Mochizuki Bodhisattva, the Moon of Liberation, again placated Vajragarbha Bodhisattva, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 佛子！
translation: Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 願說勿疑。
translation: "May it be said, 'Don't doubt it.'

source_sentence: 由佛神力佛所護念，此如是等不思議處皆得可信。
translation: Because of the Buddha's miraculous power and the Buddha's mindfulness, these kinds of inconceivable places are all believable.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 唯佛子！
translation: Only the sons of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 說此十地解釋之時，法爾如是，謂一切佛皆悉護念，一切菩薩為欲衛護此智地故皆發勇悍。
translation: When this explanation of the ten stages was explained, it was thus true that all buddhas guarded their thoughts and all bodhisattvas became courageous because they wanted to guard this ground of wisdom.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 此是菩薩最初正行，亦是一切佛法修證。
translation: This is the bodhisattva's first correct practice, and it's the cultivation of all Buddhist teachings.

source_sentence: 唯佛子！
translation: Only the son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 譬如一切書字數說，字母為始、字母為終，無有少分書字數說離字母者。
translation: For example, of all the ways to write and count words, the alphabet is the beginning and the letters are the end, and there's no part of writing and counting that's free of letters.

source_sentence: 佛子！
translation: Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 一切佛法亦復如是，以地為始發修行故，以地為終證佛智故。
translation: "So it is with all buddha-dharmas, in that the ground is the starting point for cultivation and the ground is the final point for realizing buddha-wisdom.

source_sentence: 是故佛子！
translation: Therefore, son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 願為演說，諸佛、應供、正遍等覺加持護念。」
translation: May you explain it for them, and the buddhas, worshipful ones, and completely enlightened ones will give support and attention to it."

source_sentence: 爾時，解脫月菩薩，欲重宣此義而說頌言：「善哉佛子願演說，　　趣入菩提諸地行；　十方一切自在尊，　　無不護念智根本。
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Jñānacandra Moon wanted to recapitulate this meaning and spoke the verse, "Good, Prince Buddha, may you explain the practices of the stages leading into enlightenment; all the self-perfect honored ones in the ten directions invariably guard the root of mindfulness and knowledge.

source_sentence: 此正行始此智終，　　一切佛法從此起；　如諸書等字母攝，　　佛法依地亦如是。」
translation: This correct practice begins and this wisdom ends, and all the Buddha's teachings arise from this; just as the alphabet is collected in books and so forth, so is the ground on which the Buddha's teachings are based."

source_sentence: 爾時，此諸大菩薩眾，亦為此義一時同聲，而以頌請金剛藏菩薩曰：「上妙無垢智，　　善說無邊辯；　宣揚美妙言，　　勝義相應理。
translation: At the time, this large assembly of bodhisattvas also spoke together at once for this purpose and invoked the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva with this verse, saying, "Exalted by sublime and undefiled wisdom, he skillfully explains limitless eloquence and proclaims wonderful words that match the principle of the ultimate truth.

source_sentence: 念持清淨慧，　　為十力意樂；　無礙解決擇，　　說殊勝十地。
translation: He maintains pure wisdom, creates ten powerful intentions, and speaks of the superior ten stages without obstructing discernment.

source_sentence: 此眾離憍慢，　　及見疑雜染；　戒定審悅意，　　唯願聞善說。
translation: These are the people who are free of pride and the defilement of doubt in their views, who are mindful of the precepts and meditation, and who wish to hear good explanations.

source_sentence: 如渴思冷水，　　如飢念美食，　如病憶良藥，　　如眾蜂嗜蜜，　此眾亦如是，　　願聞甘露法。
translation: As they long for cold water, crave good food, remember good medicine when they're ill, and crave honey as many bees do, so too do these people wish to hear the nectar-like teaching.

source_sentence: 善哉清淨智，　　說無垢地位；　顯十力相應，　　無礙善逝道。」
translation: It's good to have pure wisdom that explains the status of the undefiled and demonstrates the ten powers that go along with it and don't obstruct the path of the well gone."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊釋迦牟尼，從白毫相放無數光，名照菩薩力，無數光明以為眷屬，其光普照十方世界靡不周遍，諸惡趣苦皆令休息，映蔽一切諸魔宮殿，悉照無量諸佛眾會，顯示諸佛不可思議境界行相威力遊戲。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān Śākyamuni emitted an incalculable amount of light from his white tuft of hair, which is called the power of the bodhisattva Shō, and countless lights were used as his retinue, whose light universally illuminated the worlds in the ten directions, bringing rest to the suffering of the evil destinies, shading all the demonic palaces, and completely illuminating measureless assemblies of buddhas, revealing their unfathomable objects, conduct, and authoritative play.

source_sentence: 照於十方諸世界中，及於一切諸佛眾會，以佛神力所加說法菩薩身已，於上空中成大光雲網臺而住。
translation: After shining in all the worlds in the ten directions and in all the Buddha assemblies, the bodhisattva's body was taught by the Buddha's supernormal power, and it became a great tower of nets of light in the upper sky.

source_sentence: 彼諸世尊亦復如是，從白毫相放無數光，無數光明以為眷屬，其光普照十方世界靡不周遍，諸惡趣苦皆令休息，映蔽一切諸魔宮殿，悉照無量諸佛眾會，顯示諸佛不可思議境界行相威力遊戲。
translation: *Likewise, the Bhagavān radiates measureless lights from his white tuft of hair, and countless lights are their retinues, which illuminate the worlds of the ten directions without fail, bringing rest to the suffering of all the evil destinies, shading all the demonic palaces, and completely illuminating measureless assemblies of buddhas, displaying the unfathomable range and form of the buddhas and their mighty play.

source_sentence: 照於十方諸世界中及於一切諸佛眾會，以佛神力所加說法菩薩之身，顯不思議諸佛遊戲，并照世尊釋迦牟尼大會之眾及金剛藏菩薩身已，於上空中亦復成就大光明雲網臺而住。
translation: After shining on all the worlds in the ten directions and on the bodies of all the buddha assemblies, revealing the inconceivable play of the buddhas and shining on the bodies of the Bhagavān Śakyamuni's assembly and Vajragarbha Bodhisattva, it also creates a great bright cloud-net dais in the sky above and stands there.

source_sentence: 由是世尊釋迦牟尼，從白毫相所流光明，彼彼世界彼佛眾會，及彼菩薩身與法座，皆現了然於此得見。
translation: As a result, the Bhagavān Śakyamuni's radiance radiating from his white tuft of hair, that congregation of buddhas in that world, that bodhisattva's body, and his Dharma throne are all clearly visible here.

source_sentence: 由彼無量佛剎土中，諸佛世尊從白毫相所流光明，此之三千大千世界，及此世尊釋迦牟尼大會之眾，并金剛藏菩提薩埵身及法座，皆現了然於彼得見。
translation: From the light that streams from the white tuft of hair on the faces of the buddhas in those measureless buddha-lands, this world of 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, this congregation of the Bhagavān Śākyamuni, and the body and Dharma throne of the Vajrasattva all appear to be clearly visible to Peter.

source_sentence: 爾時，從此光雲網臺出是頌曰：「佛無等等如虛空，　　十力自在無邊眾；　於釋師子妙法中，　　天人最上今加汝。
translation: At the time, this verse emerged from this dais of clouds of light and nets, saying, "The Buddha is without equal like space, his ten powers are unlimited, and among the marvelous teachings of Śākyamuni, the gods and humans are the most venerable of you.

source_sentence: 佛子當承佛神力，　　開此法王妙法藏；　顯示微妙廣大行，　　分別建立諸智地。
translation: The Buddha's disciples will inherit the Buddha's spiritual power, open up this wonderful dharma-store of the Dharma-king, display its subtle and vast practices, and discriminate and establish the stages of wisdom.

source_sentence: 若有聞此勝法門，　　亦蒙善逝所加護；　十方一切諸菩薩，　　悉皆攝持及護念。
translation: If anyone hears this excellent teaching, they'll also be protected by Sugata, and all the bodhisattvas in the ten directions will gather support and protect their thoughts.

source_sentence: 當能修集諸正行，　　次第成滿無垢地；　能證十力等功德，　　契悟無上正等覺。
translation: They'll be able to cultivate correct practices that will sequentially complete the undefiled stage, realize the ten powers and other attributes, and fully awaken to unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 雖住海水劫火中，　　無疑堪聞此法門；　其有疑惑不信者，　　永復不聞如是義。
translation: Even though they live in the midst of an ocean of water and an eon of fire, they'll be able to hear this teaching without doubt, but those who have doubts and disbelief will never hear such a meaning again.

source_sentence: 當說最勝地智道，　　證入安住及昇進；　修行境界如次說，　　利樂一切有情故。」
translation: He will explain the path of supreme wisdom, realize its entry, stabilize it, and advance it; he will explain the state of cultivation in this way, for the benefit and welfare of all sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，金剛藏菩薩觀察十方，欲令大眾增淨信故而說頌言：「微細難知大仙道，　　不可分別離分別；　難證無濁慧者境，　　性常寂靜無生滅。
translation: At the time, Vajragarbha Bodhisattva was surveying the ten directions, and he spoke this verse in order to cause the crowd to have more pure faith, saying, "The path of the great sage is too subtle and difficult to know to be discerned, too indiscriminable to be free of discrimination, too difficult to realize the state of unsullied wisdom, and its nature is always quiescent and without arising or ceasing.

source_sentence: 性空能寂無二盡，　　離趣平等至涅槃；　無邊中緣無所證，　　出過三世等虛空。
translation: Empty in nature, capable of quiescence without duality, they escape their destinies and reach nirvāṇa equally; without limit or intermediate condition or realization, they transcend the three worlds and equal space.

source_sentence: 寂靜寂滅佛所證，　　以諸言趣難宣說；　此地及行亦如是，　　說猶甚難何況聽！
translation: Stillness and extinction are realized by the Buddha, which is difficult to explain given the various linguistic destinies; this stage and practice are likewise, and it's still very difficult to explain, let alone listen!

source_sentence: 遠離思惟及心道，　　此智所引牟尼境；　非蘊、界、處所顯了，　　非心所測、意所思。
translation: "Far removed from contemplation and the path of the mind, this object of knowledge is called the muni; it's not something that's revealed in the aggregates, elements, or fields, and it's not something that the mind discerns or thinks about.

source_sentence: 譬如空中諸鳥跡，　　智者叵宣難可示；　諸佛子地亦如是，　　說尚極難何況聽！
translation: Like the traces of birds in the air, which are inexpressible and difficult for a wise man to show, so too are the stages of the children of the buddhas, which are still extremely difficult to teach, let alone listen to!

source_sentence: 今當但說此一分，　　由大慈悲及願力；　如其漸次非心境，　　以智能滿如意樂。
translation: "Now, we'll simply explain this part, which is based on the power of great compassion and the vow; it's gradually not a mental object, but the accomplishment of such intentions with intelligence.

source_sentence: 如是此境極難見，　　叵說唯住自意樂；　然承佛力我今說，　　汝等一心恭敬聽。
translation: Such an object is extremely difficult to see, and it's not possible to say that it's only abiding in one's own intention; yet thanks to the Buddha's power, I'll now explain it, and you'll listen with unified mind and respect.

source_sentence: 如是智門及正行，　　億劫宣說猶難盡；　我今略說汝等聽，　　真實法義盡如理。
translation: Such a wise approach and right practice are still inexhaustible when they're explained over hundreds of eons, but now I'll explain them briefly for you to hear the true meaning of the Dharma in full as it really is.

source_sentence: 仁者專心恭敬待，　　我承佛力當善說；　宣揚微妙正法音，　　譬喻相應協倫字。
translation: You concentrate your mind and respectfully await it, and I will explain it well thanks to the Buddha's power; proclaiming the subtle sounds of the right teaching, I will explain the metaphors that go along with the words.

source_sentence: 此以言詞難顯了，　　而蒙無量佛神力；　光形聚入於我身，　　由是我今能演說。
translation: This is because words are difficult to understand, yet I've been blessed with the Buddha's immeasurable power, which has gathered in my body in the form of a ray of light, and thus I'm now able to explain it.

source_sentence: 「唯諸佛子！
translation: "Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 若有有情，善積善根，善集資糧，善修諸行，善事諸佛，善聚白法，善友所攝，善淨意樂，隨順廣大增上意樂；具妙勝解悲愍現前，為求佛智，為欲證悟十力之力，為獲如來大無所畏，為得平等佛不共法，為欲救拔一切世間，為淨大悲愍，為悟十方無所餘智，為以無礙淨諸佛剎，為一剎那能知三世，為無所畏轉大法輪，發如是心。
translation: "If there are sentient beings who well accumulate good roots, well gather accumulations, well cultivate practices, well serve the buddhas, well gather white dharmas, are well-concluded by good friends, well-purify their intentions, and conform to a wide range of superior intentions, are endowed with marvelous resolve and compassionate presence, seek the Buddha's wisdom in order to realize the ten powers, attain the great fearlessness of the Tathāgata, attain equality in the Buddha's distinctive qualities, want to save all the world, purify great compassion, realize wisdom without remainder in ten directions, purify the buddha bases with unhinderedness, know the three worlds in a single moment, and turn the great wheel of the Dharma without fear, they give rise to this kind of intention.

source_sentence: 菩薩發心大悲為先導，慧智增上方便善巧之所攝受，意樂及與增上意樂常所輔持，佛力無量以堅持力及以智力，善擇決定無礙智現前，隨順無師自然妙智，能受一切佛法慧智，教授誨示，極於法界盡虛空性，窮未來際。
translation: With great compassion as the guide, the bodhisattva's arousal of mind, superior wisdom, skillful means of taking in, the constant support of aspiration and superior aspiration, the immeasurable power of the buddhas with perseverance and competence, the manifestation of the wisdom of skillful discernment, and the subtle wisdom of following the natural teacher of none, he's able to receive the wisdom of all the buddhas' teachings and instructions, which reach the end of the nature of space in the Dharma realm and the limit of the future.

source_sentence: 始發此心，即是菩薩超異生地，證入菩薩正性離生，生如來家，種族尊貴無可譏嫌，已離世趣入出世道，住於菩薩本法性中，已善安住於菩薩處，隨順三世平等之法，紹如來種，決定趣向正等菩提。
translation: When he first arouses this mind, he's a bodhisattva who transcends the level of unenlightened birth, realizes the bodhisattva's true nature, escapes birth, is born into the family of the Tathāgata, is of noble race and beyond criticism, has left the world and entered the supramundane path, abides in the bodhisattva's original Dharma nature, is well-situated in the bodhisattva's place, conforms to the teaching of the equality of the three worlds, introduces the Tathāgata's seed, and is definitely headed for correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩住於如是等法，名已善住極喜地中，以不動故。
translation: When a bodhisattva abides in such a state, it's called having abided well in the ground of ultimate bliss because it's motionless.

source_sentence: 「唯諸佛子！
translation: "Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩住於極喜地時，極多歡喜，多淨信，多愛樂，多適悅，多忻慶，多踊躍，多勇悍，多無鬪諍，多無惱害，多無瞋恨。
translation: When a bodhisattva abides in the ground of ultimate bliss, he's extremely joyous, has lots of pure faith, is delighted, is delighted, is happy, is enthusiastic, is courageous, has no quarrels, is not harmful, and has no anger.

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩住於極喜地中，念諸佛時，發生極喜；念佛法時，念菩薩時，念菩薩行時，念到彼岸清淨之時，念諸菩薩地殊勝時，念餘菩薩不映奪時，念佛教授教誡之時，念令有情得利益時，念當趣入一切如來智加行時，皆生歡喜。
translation: When a bodhisattva abides in the ground of extreme joy, extreme joy arises when he's mindful of the buddhas, when he's mindful of the buddha's teaching, when he's mindful of the bodhisattva's practice, when he's mindful of the purity of the other shore, when he's mindful of the excellence of the bodhisattva stages, when he's mindful that the other bodhisattvas won't overpower him, when he's mindful of the Buddha's teaching and instructions, when he's mindful of bringing benefit to sentient beings, and when he's mindful that he'll enter the applied practices of the wisdom of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 又此菩薩了知，我今轉離一切世間境界，親近諸佛遠異生地，近至智地，永斷一切墮險惡趣，與諸有情為依止處。
translation: This bodhisattva also knows that I've now become free of all mundane realms, become close to the buddhas, go far from the level of unborn things, approach the level of wisdom, permanently end all falls into dangerous and bad destinies, and become a base for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 近見諸佛住佛境界，入諸菩薩平等性中，捨離一切怖畏毛竪，故生極喜。
translation: Seeing the buddhas standing near to the buddha-realm and entering into the equality of the bodhisattvas, I abandon all fears and hairs and become extremely happy.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the sons of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩纔證極喜地已，所有怖畏，謂：不活畏、惡名畏、死畏、惡趣畏、處眾怯畏，悉皆遠離。
translation: After a bodhisattva first realizes the ground of ultimate bliss, all fears, namely, the fear of not being able to live, the fear of bad reputation, the fear of death, the fear of bad destinies, and the fear of being in many places, are all avoided.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 由是菩薩離我想故，尚無我愛，況復生於諸資具愛；由是因緣，無不活畏。
translation: Because the bodhisattva is free of self-conception, there's still no craving for self, so why wouldn't there be craving for the necessities of life?

source_sentence: 由於他所無所希望，唯自起欲，我應給施一切有情諸資生具；由是因緣，無惡名畏。
translation: Because I have no desire for anything other than myself, I should give the necessities of life to all sentient beings; because of this, I have no fear of being misnamed.

source_sentence: 由離我見，於我無有失壞之想，故無死畏。
translation: Because I'm free of the view of self, I have no perception of loss or destruction of self, so I have no fear of death.

source_sentence: 自知死後，於當來世決定不離諸佛菩薩；由是因緣，無惡趣畏。
translation: I know that after death, I certainly won't part with the buddhas and bodhisattvas in future lives; because of this, I have no fear of bad destinies.

source_sentence: 由意樂見一切世間尚無有一與我齊等何況殊勝，是故無有處眾怯畏。
translation: Because their aspiration is to see that there's no one in the world equal to me, let alone superior, there's no place for the fear of crowds.

source_sentence: 「唯諸佛子！
translation: "Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩如是，已離怖畏憍傲毛竪，以大悲愍而為先導，以無憎背無俗意樂，為欲修證一切善根勤修加行。
translation: Thus, having parted with fear and pride, the bodhisattva takes great compassion as his guide, cultivates diligently the applied practices without hatred or resentment or worldly aspirations in order to cultivate all good roots.

source_sentence: 以信增上，以多證淨，以潔勝解，以多信解，以引發悲愍，以具足大慈，以無厭倦心，以慚愧莊嚴，以常忍辱柔和相應，以深敬順信重尊貴如來聖教，以無厭足日夜積集一切善根，以奉事善友，以樂於法苑，以無厭足訪求多聞，以所聞法如理觀察，以無依著心，以不耽嗜名利恭敬，以不希戀資生之具，以無厭足引平等心猶若寶珠，以專希求一切智地，以緣如來力、無所畏、不共佛法，以求無著波羅蜜多，以離諂誑，以如說行，以常護實語，以不污佛家而勸於他，以不捨離諸菩薩學，以不傾動薩波若心如大山王，以不離諸世間事而能成就出世間道，以無厭修覺分資糧，以常希求後後勝法。
translation: 以信增上，以多證淨，以潔勝解，以多信解，以引發悲愍，以具足大慈，以無厭倦心，以慚愧莊嚴，以常忍辱柔和相應，以深敬順信重尊貴如來聖教，以無厭足日夜積集一切善根，以奉事善友，以樂於法苑，以無厭足訪求多聞，以所聞法如理觀察，以無依著心，以不耽嗜名利恭敬，以不希戀資生之具，以無厭足引平等心猶若寶珠，以專希求一切智地，以緣如來力、無所畏、不共佛法，以求無著波羅蜜多，以離諂誑，以如說行，以常護實語，以不污佛家而勸於他，以不捨離諸菩薩學，以不傾動薩波若心如大山王，以不離諸世間事而能成就出世間道，以無厭修覺分資糧，以常希求後後勝法。

source_sentence: 唯諸佛子！
translation: Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 以如是等諸淨地法相應，菩薩名住安住極喜地中。
translation: According to such pure stages as these, the bodhisattva is said to abide in the stage of ultimate bliss.

source_sentence: 「復次，菩薩住於極喜地時，引發如是諸大誓願、諸大勇決、諸大出離，為以無餘供養之具，及以周備承事品類，普遍供養一切如來。
translation: "Furthermore, when the bodhisattva abides in the ground of ultimate bliss, he gives rise to these great vows, these great resolve, and these great deliverances, in order to make universal offerings to all the Tathāgatas with an endless array of offerings and a comprehensive assortment of services.

source_sentence: 一切行相勝妙成就，而以最上勝解，清淨廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數佛出世數無有休息，為大供事發初大願。
translation: With the most sublime accomplishment of all practices, the supreme resolve to purify the vast Dharma realm, exhaust the nature of space, and reach the end of the future, and the number of times the buddhas appear in the world without rest, he makes the first great vow for a great offering.

source_sentence: 為欲受持一切如來所說法眼，為欲攝受諸佛菩提，為護一切正等覺教，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數無有休息，為攝受妙法發第二大願。
translation: In order to uphold the eye of the Dharma taught by all the Tathāgatas, to gather in the buddhas for their enlightenment, and to protect all the teachings of the perfectly enlightened ones, he makes the second great vow to gather in the marvelous Dharma when the vast Dharma realm reaches the end of its empty nature and has no rest for all the eons yet to come.

source_sentence: 為一切佛出現於世，無餘一切諸世界中，住覩史多天宮為首，降下、入胎、住胎、生長、出家、成道、受梵王請、轉大法輪、示大涅槃，為悉往詣供養受法加行為先，為一切處同時而轉，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數佛出世數無有休息，為悉往詣發第三大願。
translation: He gives rise to the third great vow in order to meet all the buddhas who appear in the world, abide at the head of the palace of Tushita in all the worlds without remainder, descend, enter the womb, remain in the womb, grow up, leave home, attain the way, accept the invitation of Brahmā, turn the great wheel of the Dharma, and reveal the great nirvāṇa, make offerings to all of them, make offerings to them, and perform the ritual at the same time for all places, exhaust the vast Dharma realm, end the nature of space, and have no rest during all the eons when buddhas appear in the world.

source_sentence: 為欲引發諸菩薩行，廣大無量及無分別波羅蜜多之所攝受，淨治諸地總相、別相、同相、異相、成相、壞相，諸菩薩行如實無倒，顯示菩薩智地之道，悉能瑩飾諸到彼岸，授與教授，教誡所持資助發心，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及正行數無有休息，為是引發第四大願。
translation: In order to induce bodhisattva practices that are collected by the vast, immeasurable, and nondiscriminating pāramitā, purify the stages in their general, specific, similar, dissimilar, formed, and destroyed aspects, make bodhisattva practices truly faultless, reveal the bodhisattva's path to the stages of wisdom, fully adorn all those who reach the other shore, bestow teachings, and instruct those who uphold it to sponsor the aspiration, and there's no rest for all the eons and the number of correct practices up to the end of the vast Dharma realm and the nature of space, thus initiating the fourth great vow.

source_sentence: 為欲成就無餘一切諸有情界，有色、無色、有想、無想、非有想、非無想、卵生、胎生、濕生、化生，三界所繫入於六趣，繫屬一切受生之處名色所攝，為令趣入於佛法中，為令永斷一切趣數，為令安處一切智智，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數有情界數無有休息，為欲成熟諸有情界發第五大願。
translation: In order to bring about the completion of sentient beings without remainder, be they colored, formless, imagined, unassociated, non-associated, non-non-associated, egg-born, womb-born, wet-born, or transformation-born, bound to the three realms, or bound to the six destinies, bound to all places of birth that are included in names and forms, in order to cause them to enter the Buddha's teaching, in order to permanently end all the number of rebirths, and in order to stabilize in the knowledge of all things, the fifth great vow is given rise to in order to mature the sentient beings without rest for all the eons and the number of sentient beings for the entirety of the vast Dharma realm's empty nature, both past and future.

source_sentence: 為欲無餘一切世界廣大無量麁細亂住覆住仰住帝網差別，入於十方種種異相，皆以隨行現前知見，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及世界數無有休息，為欲往趣發第六大願。
translation: In order to have the remainder of all the worlds vast and limitless, crude and fine, confused and abiding, elevated and abiding in the Diadem, to enter the various forms in the ten directions with the knowledge and vision that follows them all, to exhaust the nature of space in the vast Dharma realm until the end of time, and to have no rest for the number of eons and worlds, he gives rise to the sixth great vow for the purpose of going there.

source_sentence: 為令一切諸佛剎土，復一剎土入於一切諸佛剎土普皆清淨，無量佛剎光明嚴具以為莊飾，離諸煩惱成清淨道，無量智性有情充滿，普入廣大諸佛境界，隨諸有情意樂示現皆令歡喜，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及佛剎數無有休息，為飾一切諸佛剎土發第七大願。
translation: In order to cause all the buddha-lands and one more land to enter all the buddha-lands, they're all purified, adorned with the radiant splendor of measureless buddha bases, freed from afflictions and made pure, filled with sentient beings of measureless intelligence, universally entering the vast realm of the buddhas, making all sentient beings rejoice as their intentions reveal themselves, making the vast Dharma realm endless in space and numberless in all the eons and buddha bases without rest, and raising the seventh great vow for the purpose of adorning all the buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 為與一切菩薩同一意樂加行，為無怨敵積集善根，為一所緣與諸菩薩得平等性，為常逢遇諸佛菩薩不相捨離，為隨自欲示佛出世，為隨心念解佛威力，為獲圓滿一切生中常不退轉隨行神通，為遍遊歷一切世界，為於一切眾會影現，為隨一切受生之處同類而行，為恒成就不可思議大乘理趣，為欲修行菩薩正行，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及正行數無有休息，為大智神通發第八大願。
translation: In order to share the same aspirations and practices as all bodhisattvas, to accumulate good roots without enmity, to attain equality with bodhisattvas for one condition, to always encounter buddhas and bodhisattvas without abandoning each other, to reveal the Buddha's appearance in the world according to one's own desires, to understand the Buddha's authority according to one's mind, to attain the power of constant, nonretrogressing follow-through abilities that perfect all births, to travel throughout all worlds, to be seen in all assemblies, to walk in the same direction in all places of birth, to consistently achieve the unfathomable aim of the great vehicle, to cultivate the correct practice of bodhisattvas, to end the vast Dharma realm and the nature of space for as long as it lasts, to have no rest for all eons and the number of correct practices, and to give rise to the eighth great vow for great supernormal powers of cognition.

source_sentence: 為行乘御不退轉輪諸菩薩行，為身、語、意業不唐捐，為暫見者便得決定諸佛法性，暫聞言音便隨智證，纔生淨信永斷煩惱，為身得成如大藥王，為得身心如如意寶，為當修行大菩薩行，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及正行數無有休息，為不唐捐發第九大願。
translation: In order to practice the nonretrogressing activities of the bodhisattvas, to perform physical, verbal, and mental actions without fail, to attain certainty about the buddhas' Dharma nature when I see them for a moment, to realize it with wisdom when I hear their voices for a moment, to permanently end affliction with a little bit of pure faith, to achieve a body like a great medicine king, to attain a body and mind like a wish-granting jewel, to cultivate the great bodhisattva practices, to exhaust the vast Dharma realm and the nature of space until the end of time, and to have no rest from all the eons and the number of correct actions, he gives rise to the ninth great vow for the sake of not failing.

source_sentence: 為於一切諸世界中，當證無上正等菩提為不殊異，於一毛道遍於一切諸毛道中，示生、出家、道場、正覺、轉大法輪、歸大寂滅，為當現證弘佛境界威力智慧，隨於一切有情意樂示佛出世，令其所化剎那剎那覺寂證修，為剎那頃以一正覺普遍一切法寂滅性，為以一音演說法要，令諸有情心皆悅豫，為示大涅槃而行力不絕，為示大智地建立一切法，為以法智神變幻通，悉能充遍一切世界，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及正覺數無有休息，為引發大乘菩薩發起第十大願。
translation: 為於一切諸世界中，當證無上正等菩提為不殊異，於一毛道遍於一切諸毛道中，示生、出家、道場、正覺、轉大法輪、歸大寂滅，為當現證弘佛境界威力智慧，隨於一切有情意樂示佛出世，令其所化剎那剎那覺寂證修，為剎那頃以一正覺普遍一切法寂滅性，為以一音演說法要，令諸有情心皆悅豫，為示大涅槃而行力不絕，為示大智地建立一切法，為以法智神變幻通，悉能充遍一切世界，廣大法界盡虛空性窮未來際，一切劫數及正覺數無有休息，為引發大乘菩薩發起第十大願。

source_sentence: 「唯諸佛子！
translation: "Only the children of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 初地菩薩，發如是等諸大誓願、諸大勇決、諸大出離。
translation: At the first ground level, the bodhisattva makes these kinds of great vows, these kinds of great courageous resolutions, and these kinds of great departures.

source_sentence: 菩薩住此極喜地中，十大願門以為上首，引發圓滿百千阿僧企耶諸餘正願，是諸大願以十盡句而引發之。
translation: When a bodhisattva abides in this ground of ultimate bliss, the ten vows take the lead, giving rise to the full accomplishment of a hundred thousand incalculable vows, which are triggered by the phrase ten perfect vows.

source_sentence: 何等為十？
translation: What are the ten?

source_sentence: 所謂：以有情界盡，以世界盡，以虛空界盡，以法界盡，以涅槃界盡，以佛興界盡，以入如來智慧界盡，以心所緣界盡，以智入佛所行界盡，以世間轉法輪智轉界盡；若有情界有斷盡者，是大誓願乃有斷盡；乃至若智轉界有斷盡者，是大誓願乃有斷盡。
translation: It means that if there's an end to the realm of sentient beings, an end to the world, an end to the realm of space, an end to the realm of the Dharma, an end to the realm of nirvāṇa, an end to the realm of the flourishing of the Buddha, an end to the realm of entry into the Tathāgata's wisdom, an end to the realm of the mind's perceptual objects, an end to the realm of entry into the Buddha's practices with wisdom, and an end to the realm of the turning of the world's Dharma wheel with wisdom, then if there's an end to the realm of sentient beings, then the great vow is ended; even if there's an end to the realm of the turning of wisdom, then the great vow is ended.

source_sentence: 然有情界終無斷盡，此諸善根願無斷盡，乃至智轉界終無斷盡，此諸善根亦無斷盡。
translation: Still, if the sentient being realm never ends, these good roots will never end, and I hope that the wisdom-transformation realm never ends, and these good roots will never end.

source_sentence: 佛說十地經卷第一
translation: Foshuo shidi jing roll 1
